title: Sri Lanka re-integrates another 1800 rehabilitated former LTTE cadres into society
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) The Government of Sri Lanka is reintegrated 1800 rehabilitated former LTTE cadres into society at a ceremony held at Temple Trees today on 30 September. The Ministry of Rehabilitation and Prison Reforms organized this special ceremony in view of socializing rehabilitated ex-Tamil Tiger combatants….
